All,

Oberlin, Doyle, Konetchy, Tannehill, Arndt are sold.

Still getting rid of dupes.  Asking $SOLD a piece plus 2$ shipping.  If you buy 3 or more, shipping is free.  Remaining lot would be $SOLD plus free shipping.

"I'll take it" takes precedence over any negotiations......

.....but make an offer if you want!
